attributes.additional_details: The quality of teaching and resources available does not justify hefty tuition fees that undergraduates and postgraduates are paying. We are not paying thousands of pounds to sit at home and watch recorded lectures.
attributes.background: Get Universities to reduce 2020/21 and onwards tuition fees until online learning ends.

rejection.details:
